Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.search.suggest.document.NRTSuggester

  • Packages that use NRTSuggester 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.suggest.document
    Support for document suggestion

    • Uses of NRTSuggester in org.apache.lucene.search.suggest.document

      Methods in org.apache.lucene.search.suggest.document that return NRTSuggester 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static NRTSuggester NRTSuggester.load​(IndexInput input, CompletionPostingsFormat.FSTLoadMode fstLoadMode)
      Loads a NRTSuggester from IndexInput on or off-heap depending on the provided fstLoadMode
      NRTSuggester CompletionsTermsReader.suggester()
      Returns the suggester for a field, if not loaded already, loads the appropriate suggester from CompletionDictionary
      NRTSuggester CompletionTerms.suggester()
      Returns a NRTSuggester for the field or null if no FST was indexed for this field
      Constructors in org.apache.lucene.search.suggest.document with parameters of type NRTSuggester 
      Constructor Description
      CompletionScorer​(CompletionWeight weight, NRTSuggester suggester, LeafReader reader, Bits filterDocs, boolean filtered, Automaton automaton)
      Creates a scorer for a field-specific suggester scoped by acceptDocs
